body: At 2nd level and every four levels thereafter, a magician can add one spell to his spells known from the spell list of any arcane spellcasting class. The spell must be of a level he can cast. This ability replaces versatile performance.
name: Expanded Repertoire
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Bard/Bard Archetypes/Magician/Expanded Repertoire
